text: This is a list of rivers in Benin. They are arranged by where the river drains. Tributaries are indented under each larger stream's name. *Volta River (Ghana) **Oti River ***Kara River ***Pendjari River *Mono River **Couffo River (Kouffo River) *Ouémé River **Zou River ***Agbado River **Okpara River **Alpouro River *Niger River **Oli River **Sota River ***Bouli River ***Tassiné River **Alibori River ***Pako River **Mékrou River Benin Benin
title: List of rivers of Benin
